user_uuid.description: The assigned unique ID of a signed in REOpt user

description.description: An optional user defined description to describe the scenario and run

address.description: A user defined address as optional metadata (street address, city, state or zip code)

time_steps_per_hour.description: The number of time steps per hour in the REopt simulation

timeout_seconds.description: The number of seconds allowed before the optimization times out

optimality_tolerance.description: The threshold for the difference between the solution's objective value and the best possible value at which the solver terminates

latitude.description: The approximate latitude of the site in decimal degrees

longitude.description: The approximate longitude of the site in decimal degrees

land_acres.description: Land area in acres available for PV panel siting

roof_squarefeet.description: Area of roof in square feet available for PV siting

elec_cost_escalation_rate_fraction.description: Annual nominal utility electricity cost escalation rate

value_of_lost_load_per_kwh.description: Value placed on unmet site load during grid outages. Units are US dollars per unmet kilowatt-hour. The value of lost load (VoLL) is used to determine the avoided outage costs by multiplying VoLL [$/kWh] with the average number of hours that the critical load can be met by the energy system (determined by simulating outages occuring at every hour of the year), and multiplying by the mean critical load.

microgrid_upgrade_cost_fraction.description: Additional cost, in fraction of non-islandable capital costs, to make a distributed energy system islandable from the grid and able to serve critical loads. Includes all upgrade costs such as additional laber and critical load panels.

om_cost_escalation_rate_fraction.description: Annual nominal O&M cost escalation rate

add_monthly_rates_to_urdb_rate.description: Set to 'true' to add the monthly blended energy rates and demand charges to the URDB rate schedule. Otherwise, blended rates will only be considered if a URDB rate is not provided.

coincident_peak_load_active_time_steps.description: The optional coincident_peak_load_charge_per_kw will apply to the max grid-purchased power during these time steps. Note time steps are indexed to a base of 1 not 0.

coincident_peak_load_charge_per_kw.description: Optional coincident peak demand charge that is applied to the max load during the time_steps specified in coincident_peak_load_active_time_steps

wholesale_rate.description: Price of electricity sold back to the grid in absence of net metering or above net metering limit, restricted to total site load

interconnection_limit_kw.description: Limit on system capacity size that can be interconnected to the grid

export_rate_beyond_net_metering_limit.description: Price of electricity sold back to the grid above the site load, regardless of net metering

urdb_response.description: Utility rate structure from Utility Rate Database API

blended_annual_demand_rate.description: Annual blended demand rates (annual demand charge cost in $ divided by annual peak demand in kW)

blended_annual_energy_rate.description: Annual blended energy rate (total annual energy in kWh divided by annual cost in $)

net_metering_limit_kw.description: System size above which net metering is not allowed

monthly_demand_rates.description: Array (length of 12) of blended demand charges (demand charge cost in $ divided by monthly peak demand in kW)

urdb_utility_name.description: Name of Utility from Utility Rate Database

urdb_label.description: Label attribute of utility rate structure from Utility Rate Database API

urdb_rate_name.description: Name of utility rate from Utility Rate Database

monthly_energy_rates.description: Array (length of 12) of blended energy rates (total monthly energy in kWh divided by monthly cost in $)

critical_load_fraction.description: Critical load factor is multiplied by the typical load to determine the critical load that must be met during an outage. Value must be between zero and one, inclusive.

outage_start_hour.description: Hour of year that grid outage starts. Must be less than outage_end.

outage_end_hour.description: Hour of year that grid outage ends. Must be greater than outage_start.

monthly_totals_kwh.description: Array (length of 12) of total monthly energy consumption used to scale simulated building load profile.

year.description: Year of Custom Load Profile. If a custom load profile is uploaded via the loads_kw parameter, it is important that this year correlates with the load profile so that weekdays/weekends are determined correctly for the utility rate tariff. If a DOE Reference Building profile (aka simulated profile) is used, the year is set to 2017 since the DOE profiles start on a Sunday.

loads_kw.description: Typical load over all hours in one year. Must be hourly (8,760 samples), 30 minute (17,520 samples), or 15 minute (35,040 samples).

critical_loads_kw_is_net.description: If there is existing PV, must specify whether provided load is the net load after existing PV or not.

loads_kw_is_net.description: If there is existing PV, must specify whether provided load is the net load after existing PV or not.

annual_kwh.description: Annual energy consumption used to scale simulated building load profile, if monthly_totals_kwh is not provided.

doe_reference_name.description: Simulated load profile from DOE Commercial Reference Buildings

critical_loads_kw.description: Critical load during an outage period. Must be hourly (8,760 samples), 30 minute (17,520 samples), or 15 minute (35,040 samples).

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to depreciate in year one in addition to scheduled depreciation

state_rebate_per_kw.description: State rebate based on installed capacity

location.description: Indicates location of PV. Available options are roof and ground.

max_kw.description: Maximum PV size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable PV

gcr.description: PV ground cover ratio (photovoltaic array area : total ground area).

federal_itc_fraction.description: Fraction of capital costs that are credited towards federal taxes

production_incentive_max_benefit.description: Maximum annual value of production-based incentives

module_type.description: PV module type (0: Standard; 1: Premium; 2: Thin Film)

array_type.description: PV Watts array type (0: Ground Mount Fixed (Open Rack); 1: Rooftop, Fixed; 2: Ground Mount 1-Axis Tracking; 3 : 1-Axis Backtracking; 4: Ground Mount, 2-Axis Tracking)

state_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of capital costs offset by state incentives

utility_ibi_max.description: Maximum dollar value of utility percentage-based capital cost incentive

om_cost_per_kw.description: Annual PV operations and maintenance costs in $/kW

utility_rebate_per_kw.description: Utility rebate based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum PV size constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Fraction of the ITC value by which depreciable basis is reduced

degradation_fraction.description: Annual rate of degradation in PV energy production

federal_rebate_per_kw.description: Federal rebates based on installed capacity

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size eligible for production-based incentive

macrs_option_years.description: Duration over which accelerated depreciation will occur. Set to zero to disable

radius.description: Radius to use when searching for the closest climate data station. Use zero to use the closest station regardless of the distance

utility_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of capital costs offset by utility incentives

state_ibi_max.description: Maximum dollar value of state percentage-based capital cost incentive

total_rebate_per_kw.description: Rebate based on installed power capacity

max_kwh.description: Maximum battery energy storage capacity constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable Storage

total_itc_fraction.description: Total investment tax credit in fraction applied toward capital costs

min_kw.description: Minimum battery power capacity size constraint for optimization

max_kw.description: Maximum battery power capacity size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable storage

replace_cost_per_kw.description: Battery power capacity replacement cost at time of replacement year

replace_cost_per_kwh.description: Battery energy capacity replacement cost at time of replacement year

min_kwh.description: Minimum battery energy storage capacity constraint for optimization

installed_cost_per_kw.description: Total upfront battery power capacity costs (e.g. inverter and balance of power systems)

battery_replacement_year.description: Number of years from start of analysis period to replace battery

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Fraction of the ITC value by which depreciable basis is reduced

canGridCharge.description: Flag to set whether the battery can be charged from the grid, or just onsite generation

macrs_bonus_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS in year one in addtion to scheduled depreciation

inverter_replacement_year.description: Number of years from start of analysis period to replace inverter

macrs_option_years.description: Duration over which accelerated depreciation will occur. Set to zero to disable

internal_efficiency_fraction.description: Battery inherent efficiency independent of inverter and rectifier

soc_min_fraction.description: Minimum allowable battery state of charge

soc_init_fraction.description: Battery state of charge at first hour of optimization

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS

max_kw.description: Maximum wind power capacity constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable Wind. Enabled by default

production_incentive_max_benefit.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility production-based incentives

wind_meters_per_sec.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

state_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to discount under state investment based incentives

utility_rebate_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility rebates

installed_cost_per_kw.description: Total upfront installed costs in US dollars per kW. Determined by size_class. For the 'large' (>2MW) size_class the cost is $1,874/kW. For the 'medium commercial' size_class the cost is $4,111 per kW. For the 'small commercial' size_class the cost is $4,989 per kW and for the 'residential' size_class the cost is $10,792 per kW

utility_ibi_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility investment based incentives

pressure_atmospheres.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size for which production-based incentives apply

utility_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to discount under utility investment based incentives

state_ibi_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state investment based incentives

wind_direction_degrees.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

size_class.description: Turbine size-class. One of [residential, commercial, medium, large]

state_rebate_per_kw.description: State rebates based on installed capacity

macrs_option_years.description: MACRS schedule for financial analysis. Set to zero to disable

state_rebate_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state rebates

temperature_celsius.description: Data downloaded from Wind ToolKit for modeling wind turbine.

om_cost_per_kw.description: Total annual operations and maintenance costs for wind

utility_rebate_per_kw.description: Utility rebates based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum wind power capacity constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Fraction of the full ITC that depreciable basis is reduced by

federal_rebate_per_kw.description: Federal rebate based on installed capacity

pbi_years.description: Duration of production-based incentives from installation date

macrs_bonus_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to depreciate under MACRS

om_cost_per_kwh.description: diesel generator per unit production (variable) operations and maintenance costs in $/kWh

max_kw.description: Maximum diesel generator size constraint for optimization. Set to zero to disable gen

production_incentive_max_benefit.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility production-based incentives

state_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to discount under state investment based incentives

fuel_intercept_gal_per_hr.description: Generator fuel consumption curve y-intercept in gallons per hour.

generator_only_runs_during_grid_outage.description: If there is existing diesel generator, must specify whether it should run only during grid outage or all the time in the bau case.

utility_rebate_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility rebates

utility_ibi_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under utility investment based incentives

fuel_avail_gal.description: On-site generator fuel available in gallons.

min_turn_down_fraction.description: Minimum generator loading in fraction of capacity (size_kw).

pbi_system_max_kw.description: Maximum system size for which production-based incentives apply

utility_ibi_fraction.description: Fraction of upfront project costs to discount under utility investment based incentives

state_ibi_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state investment based incentives

fuel_slope_gal_per_kwh.description: Generator fuel burn rate in gallons/kWh.

state_rebate_per_kw.description: State rebates based on installed capacity

macrs_option_years.description: MACRS schedule for financial analysis. Set to zero to disable

state_rebate_max.description: Maximum rebate allowed under state rebates

om_cost_per_kw.description: Annual diesel generator fixed operations and maintenance costs in $/kW

utility_rebate_per_kw.description: Utility rebates based on installed capacity

min_kw.description: Minimum diesel generator size constraint for optimization

macrs_itc_reduction.description: Fraction of the full ITC that depreciable basis is reduced by

federal_rebate_per_kw.description: Federal rebate based on installed capacity

generator_sells_energy_back_to_grid.description: If there is existing diesel generator, must specify whether it should run only during grid outage or all the time in the bau case.
